title: A New Training Method for Feedforward Neural Networks Based on Geometric Contraction Property of Activation Functions
abstract: We propose a new training method for a feedforward neural network having the activation functions with the geometric contraction property. The method consists of constructing a new functional that is less nonlinear in comparison with the classical functional by removing the nonlinearity of the activation functions from the output layer. We validate this new method by a series of experiments that show an improved learning speed and also a better classification error.
